content.question: The function f is given by <math> <mrow> <mi>f</mi> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> <mo>=</mo> <mfrac> <mrow> <mi>a</mi> <msup> <mi>x</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msup> <mo>+</mo> <mn>12</mn> </mrow> <mrow> <msup> <mi>x</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msup> <mo>+</mo> <mi>b</mi> </mrow> </mfrac> </mrow> </math>. The figure above shows a portion of the graph of f . Which of the following could be the values of the constants a and b?
